['DescriptionBurj Daman is a mixed use development in DIFC, comprising of an upcoming 5 star hotel - Waldorf Astoria - penthouses, luxury residential apartments (1, 2 and 3 bedrooms), upscale offices and retail shops. The soon-to-open hotel comprises several dining outlets, a SPA and a health club.
Burj Daman is situated in one of the most prominent locations within the DIFC, opposite the DIFC Gate Village, 15 minutes away from the Dubai International Airport.\xa0\xa0
Burj Daman also features several retail and dining outlets on the Ground and Podium levels. With the upcoming Gate Avenue, the anticipated bridge that aims to connect all DIFC buildings to the DIFC Gate Village, DIFC is becoming a destination, and Burj Daman particularly adds value to whoever works in DIFC.
All units in Burj Daman feature a large balcony accessible from the living room and bedroom(s), built-in appliances, wooden flooring, built-in wardrobes, as well as floor to ceiling widows running through the entire apartments.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionEngel & Voelkers proudly offers this Exclusive outstanding Signature villa with great views of the beach and Dubai Marina skyline.Property details:- High number\xa0- 5 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms\xa0\xa0- Walk-in wardrobes- Sea and Marina skyline views- Private gym- Extra BUA - 8600 sq.ft- Fully upgraded and fully furnished- Large windows- Private frond- Outdoor Gazebo and barbecue area- 24-hour security- Selling price: AED 43,000.000 Contact us today to arrange a viewing!\xa0The Palm Jumeirah is one of the most ambitious real-estate developments on earth, named as the 8th wonder of the world as it can be seen from space as a beautiful palm shaped land.\xa0A true resort-style development, it is described as not just a place to be, but rather an experience. It\xa0features themed hotels, villas, apartment buildings, beaches, marinas, restaurants, and a variety of retail outlets.\xa0Engel & Voelkers is one of the world\x92s leading service companies specializing in the brokerage of residential and commercial properties, yachts and aviation, with 800 offices in over 30 countries.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionMove into this Villa! This villa is located in a peaceful community, away from the hustle bustle of the city.Hydra Village is Lease Hold Development developed by Hydra Properties and located on Highway 11, the main highway connecting Abu Dhabi and Dubai and a short drive from Abu Dhabi International Airport. As part of \x91New Abu Dhabi\x92, Hydra Village is close to the new developments in Al Raha, amenities and entertainment options on Yas Island, and the future Capital District. It offers residents comfortable, green and affordable off-island community living in what will become an increasingly sought after location as Abu Dhabi progresses towards the vision outlined in Plan Abu Dhabi 2030. Features and Descriptions :Perfect finishes & light fittings Beautiful ceramic floorsPlease note that photos are not specific to the property.\nCall Shiva Vaman on +971566605367 / +97124480086 or visit www.enskyuae.com for further details']

descriptions: ["DescriptionEdwards & Towers EXCLUSIVELY presents this superb, high floor 3BR plus maids in Al Basri B1, Shoreline Palm\xa0Jumeriah.This right hand side A Type features a beautiful sea view and has been exclusively managed by E&T since its handover, it is a must-see! The apartment features a large open plan living area and kitchen, great size balcony,\xa0maids\xa0rooms or study and 3 good sized bedrooms, the master bedroom with\xa0en-suite\xa0bathroom. It is vacant now and can be viewed anytime with some prior notice.The Shoreline is located on the trunk of the Palm\xa0Jumeriah, with many shops, restaurants and cafes, along with a supermarket within walking distance. There are also children's play areas and pleasant walkways including a cushioned running track, and is one of the few locations that has\xa0its\xa0own private beach access along with several pools and gyms just for residents.\xa0Please call Hayley (BRN 36764) on +971529805737 to arrange a viewing or for more information on this property."]
